headline: NXP Secures EUR1 Billion EIB Loan to Advance Semiconductor Innovation in Europe
summary: EUR1 billion EIB loan will help fuel NXP's research, development, and innovation efforts in Austria, France, Germany, The Netherlands and Romania.Loan will accelerate NXP's RDI aimed at various end...
